name: RIVAL: Crimson x Chaos
description:
Chaos has returned to the world of Kel. Will you side with the Crimson or Chaos? Build the ultimate team and Lead them into the spoils of victory!

Defend your arena against players from around the world in the next generation of strategy and tower defense.

PVP Arena strategy

● Battle with friends and RIVALs in real time
● Face off against RIVALs from around the world
● Compete in real time battles to become the world’s top RIVAL
● Participate in tournaments for bragging rights and rewards

Lead your Champions

● Choose your Leader and build a team strategy
● Unleash your Leader Ability to change the tides of battle
● Discover new strategies with over 35 Champions and Spells

Create strategies with RIVAL’s Ability System

● Upgrade Champions and Spells to unlock game-changing abilities
● Build new strategies with Leader abilities and upgrades
● Awaken your Spells and Champions to unleash their full potential

Play and chat with RIVAL Guilds

● Fight with your friends and RIVALs with the global guild system

Build the ultimate RIVAL team

● Mastermind new strategies against fellow RIVALs
● Discover new synergies to defeat any strategy

Create or join RIVAL guilds from around the world

● Unlock tomes, badges and other exclusive content with your guild members

Obtain rewards with RIVAL quests

● Complete quests to unlock unique tomes and gather resources

Attack, Defend, Protect. See you in the arena, RIVAL.
